title: PBE Store
body: Is anyone else having an issue with the store not opening on the PBE?

replies.body:
Hey xStrepo,

Thanks for the report! We have a [new feature](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) on the PBE boards where you can easily report issues such as these. Please use this for issues pertaining to the PBE, as it helps us keep live issues separate from PBE. :]

This issue should be resolved.

PBE has an entire different set of Boards for discussion: http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/
And I have seen several threads about the store issues on there already.
